TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DockingBehavior extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a control should be docked by default when added through a designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DockingBehavior enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockingAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> controls are set to AutoDock. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to Ask.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DockingBehavior Ask = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Prompt the user for the desired docking behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DockingBehavior AutoDock = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=fullName> when it is dropped into a container with no other child controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DockingBehavior Never = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Do not prompt the user for the desired docking behavior.
